website_summaries.verdict: Good navy and red color on this button-down Fourth of July flag shirt.
pros: Beautiful color – true to the real American flag
Well made shirt made of heavy-duty material
cons: The size on this shirt seems to run a bit large

customer_reviews.title: VERY WELL MADE - RUNS VERY LARGE
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Sewn strips. Not printed. I am 6"2" 215 lbs and usually wear an XL in everything, but this XL swallowed me whole. I reordered a Lrg. I would recommend ordering a size smaller than with you usually buy. It's a 5 star shirt, but a 3-4 star for fit.
customer_reviews.author: WarBucks

customer_reviews.title: this shirt is not wool
customer_reviews.text: this shirt is a joke it's not wool it is not the perfect fit it is just a plain shirt with a pattern on it dam sure not worth no 35 dollars I got shirts that fit way better this company advertise one thing but sell you another that's not the rite it was too large and its a cheap brand shirt you tell if you know about fashion as I do I will not recommend anyone to buy these cheap shirts with these nice patterns on them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: (Female)  Runs small
customer_reviews.text: After the 3rd time I finally got the right size. According to the chart it's way off. Tried a med. and a large way to tight in the chest. Finally Ordered an xlarge which is a perfect fit. The material is nice and we'll made. Maybe a little warm for July 4th. Would recommend, beware of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Zielke

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great and Fits Great
customer_reviews.text: Several reviews indicate that the short is too small or too big - I'm 6'1", 270lbs. I wear XXL shirts, bought a XXL and it fit like and XXL - not too short, or too long or too tight or to baggy. Fits great! Shirt is brightly colored and it got lots of compliments on the 4th! Material is 100% cotton and feels great - not thin material at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gus A.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I always wear an XL but this shirt could fit a truck. I washed it to see if it would shrink some but it’s still WAY over sized. I can’t return it since I washed it so will spend the $20.00 to have it tailored. Very disappointed !!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: F Offereins

customer_reviews.title: NOT true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son-in-law to wear for a family 4th of July photo. He is a bigger guy but this shirt wasn't even close to size! It was so small he couldn't even button it and it should have easily fit. He had to use a different shirt, just a T-Shirt for a picture where everyone else was a bit more dressy. Sent it back but was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Ross

customer_reviews.title: Very patriotic and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted it loose and comfortable so I bought a size larger, and I'm happy with the fit. The material feels like it was made from an actual flag...it's kind of a burlap cheesecloth. Only thing I don't like is the brown and white buttons. It's a small thing, but it would have been nice if navy blue buttons had been used. It would make the shirt look much better.
customer_reviews.author: Lady from the Mountain

customer_reviews.title: This shirt looked great in a pickleball round robin!!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric on this shirt is 100% cotton and feels a little on the “heavy” side. As for fit I am 130 lb. and 5’ 6” which means very “slight.” I took a chance on a “small” size and can say it fits fine. I purchased this shirt to wear for a December 7th Patriotic pickleball round robin to honor those brave young men who gave their lives on 12/07/41. I received many compliments on wearing this patriotic USA shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Gord Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: Heavy cloth, good colors, but EXCESSIVELY large - they are not using size standards for US males, but zulu warriors.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my normal "extra large" and this is a TENT, clearly designed for zulu warriors. Who ever manufactured it is NOT using standard US male shirt sizes, so caveat emptor. Otherwise the shirt is fine, but uses cheap, but thick cloth. But, it works for the patriotic parades I end up being in, so not worth sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Jochim

customer_reviews.title: Size way too big
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made, only complaint I have it's that it's way too big. The "short sleeves come down to my wrist, the opening for the sleeves can fit your leg into
customer_reviews.author: john j estrada

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shirt! Obviously
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shirt! Obviously, if you purchase a shirt that looks like the American Flag, you know what you are getting. This is exactly what it claims to be. Vibrant colors, quality materials. The sizes run big as other reviews have mentioned so I just ordered one size smaller. Awesome shirt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, great quality great price.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shirt. Fits perfectly, very comfortable to wear. I've been looking for this exact shirt in stores and can't find them. Honestly I've had trouble finding it online too. Perfect for celebrating patriotic events and even better now with Trump in the White House.
customer_reviews.author: Dallen8212

customer_reviews.title: this shirt is so very nice, nice feel very comfortable high quality i ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: this shirt is so very nice, nice feel very comfortable high quality i ordered a XL and the fit was perfect. My friends want me to order this shirt for them. I do work for the vets of America funerals etc etc buy this shirt you well not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J Millere

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt. Can be worn at anytime of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt. Can be worn at anytime of the day. Great stuff material that makes me feels good whenever I put it on. Am a Nigerian though, but friend gives compliments seeing the shirt on me.
customer_reviews.author: Bobi Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the design
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the design and the shirt itself. The material is nice and stout. However, the sizing isn't even close. It says 65% likely to fit on the advertisement. I religiously wear a large and this was 2 sizes too big. It was easily a 2XL even though the tag says Large. I'm not sure how a standard size can be that far off. I will give the Medium a shot with the plan to shrink it, even from there to fit. Quality control department apparently needs help! No excuse for that these days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this shirt based on the reviews of ...
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this shirt based on the reviews of other buyers. It is beautifully constructed; high quality and has already elicited many compliments. I usually purchase double XL, but a took other reviewers advice and bought a size smaller which was perfect for me. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: just not sure you need more than one of these bad boys in your closet
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my brother. He LOVES it!!! I will say that the shirt is a bit stiff though- despite washing it a few times. However, the color is still bright & as patriotic as ever. True to size and well made, I'd buy the shirt again.... just not sure you need more than one of these bad boys in your closet!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I saw this shirt in Cracker Barrel last summer. I believe it we $65. This is the exact same shirt at a reasonable price. Same quality. Same great design. I am happy. Looking forward to wearing it on national holidays and at car shows.
customer_reviews.author: ZZOOOOM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shirt. Different design from others I have had
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shirt. Different design from others I have had. Very well made. I have washed it twice now in cold water, light soap and then dryed it. No color run at all. Has to be lightly ironed to look crisp. As stated in other reviews, it does run a little large. Better too large than too small. I would still order an XL again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in Apopka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Washed well, nice fabric weight, great color. While I don't need more flag shirts (limited times to use it in a year), if I did, I'd buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rand

customer_reviews.title: the quality of the material is awesome. This shirt is not cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large. A shirt labeled as a large arrived, but I wouldnt be surprised if it was a XXL. seems 2 sizes too large. On the flip side, the quality of the material is awesome. This shirt is not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: TrojanFL

customer_reviews.title: This half stars and half strength
customer_reviews.text: I have no worn it yet. Going to wash it Monday then I’ll try it on
customer_reviews.author: Donald T

customer_reviews.title: Much better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: This shirt screams ‘Merica. Much better quality than expected, a little heavier thread count and super soft. Fits a little loose as most would expect for an xxl but seem to never get when ordering online. I’m very hesitant to order clothes online but this did NOT disappoint. 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: EJR

customer_reviews.title: Get a smaller size
customer_reviews.text: Glad I read the reviews and got a medium instead of a large. I'm 6 foot 1 190 lbs and the medium is still big on me. Consider getting 2 sizes smaller than you normally would. Good shirt besides that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is worthy of what they ask for it
customer_reviews.text: Good feeling and quality fabric and it looks as you would expect it to look. Its a high quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Terwilliger

customer_reviews.title: Patriotic Shirt great buy and look!
customer_reviews.text: The shirt was great for my husband to celebrate Veteran's Day! Looks very nice and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shirt from the moment it arrived. Great quality materials, and beautiful colors. Perfect patriotic shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Everyone want to know where I got it
customer_reviews.text: This shirt was exactly what I ordered and what I was hoping to receive. I have washed the shirt twice now in cold water and dried it on a hanger. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I made a big hit on the 4th of July celebration in my church. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Perez III

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shirt for the price
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews that said sizes ran small - I ordered a XXL (typically wear an XL). I was swimming in the XXL. Returned for an XL. Good quality shirt for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TMcCann

customer_reviews.title: Not a Polo Shirt, has Buttons. But very cool construction...
customer_reviews.text: Expected a Polo Shirt. Got a Button Shirt. Look closely at the pic. I hate button shirts though, but may keep because it's made of pieces just like a real flag is, especially the stripes. I am a 2XL and I got s 2XL (XXL).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good fit
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'1 and 235 lbs. I ordered the 2x and it is a nice loose type fit. No problems. Appears to be good quality!!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt, except it came with two small spots on the red stripes.
customer_reviews.author: daboys959210

customer_reviews.title: Love this shirt
customer_reviews.text: Love this shirt. Fits on the big side, but the colors are so vibrant and quality is top notch. I would buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: perfect holiday shirt
customer_reviews.text: Pretty shirt but a little heavy material for Texas heat.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shirt, nice heavy fabric, love it

customer_reviews.title: Love the shirt
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt, looks good and will order from this company again

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy,double stiching.
customer_reviews.text: Bright, washes well, double stiched in shoulders. I'm a 3x, ordered 2x, fits perfect. Sturdy/comfortable cotton material. Not thick nor thin. Arrived (2) day shipping, noon, 2nd. day, well packaged. Great buy!-JG.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Stars and Stripes Shirt
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is somewhat larger than size but not that much. It is an excellently well made shirt. Good material. I am very happy with purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Still Loving this Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: A quality product at a fair price. Update: Still enjoying this patriotic colors shirt on this July 4th.

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt. Felt like I was wearing the flag
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt. Felt like I was wearing the flag. Won the Flag Day contest for best flag outfit.

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 5 ft 6 in so this shirt has to be shortened by several inches. Otherwise, it washes, dries, looks and fits great. Hubby loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shirt!

customer_reviews.title: The shirt is nice and thick and stitched very well

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shirt

product_meta.title: Flagshirt Men's Half Stars Half Stripes American Flag Shirt - Button-Up, Red, White & Blue,
product_meta.description:
Demonstrate your patriotism and support our country with this American Summer Patriotic Polo.

We grew up saying the Pledge of Allegiance at school, and we’ve never forgotten the heritage that we share with our friends, family, and the brave men and women in uniform. American Summer was founded on the principles that make our country great: the idea that we can do better; that all men and women are created equal and endowed by their Creator with inalienable rights; that we can and should celebrate the values and identity we stand for.

We’re thankful for the support our customers, who’ve made products like our Patriotic Shirts and American Flag Leggings some of the most popular of their kind. Bring home one of our shirts today, and join the entire American Summer family in the pride of being American.
feature_bullets: LIKE WRAPPING YOURSELF IN THE AMERICAN FLAG: Ultra durable, woven material presents the red, white, and blue in a distinctive way. Dress a little more formally than a tee with this button down look.

COMFORTABLE AND BREATHABLE: Represent the USA in style this Fourth of July without sweat. This textured fabric is also layerable for holidays and events commonly accompanied by cooler weather. Readily matches jeans, khakis, and shorts alike.

VIBRANT AND EYE CATCHING: Reviewers note that this shirt attracts and lot of interest from friends all over the United States of America. Wear your freedom on your sleeve with us for Veteran's Day, Independence Day, and more.

EASY CARE: Our polo shirts are machine washable and hang or tumble dry. We’ve selected quality apparel manufacturers who use modern technology to produce shirts that are comfortable, colorfast, and long lived.

100% SATISFACTION, MONEY BACK GUARANTEE FROM AMERICAN SUMMER: We Guarantee You Will Love Your Patriotic Polo Shirt or your Money Back. If for any reason you aren’t happy with your purchase, simply return it for a full refund. Buy from Trusted Amazon Retailer, BANDED BOTTOM.
